intro_text: I'm a software developer with experience in Web3, privacy tools, and full-stack development. Currently leading web development at Blockonomics, I work with React, TypeScript, PHP, and Python to build payment infrastructure for Bitcoin merchants. I've spent the past few years working across the stack—from building responsive interfaces to architecting backend services—and collaborating with distributed teams to ship reliable products.
work_blockonomics_lead_desc1: Lead web development and mentor a distributed team, focusing on security and performance standards for Bitcoin payment processing.
work_blockonomics_lead_desc2: Built an asynchronous blockchain monitoring service that automates email notifications when transactions are confirmed on-chain.
work_blockonomics_lead_desc3: Migrated legacy JavaScript codebases to TypeScript, introducing ESLint configurations and type-safety practices across the platform.
work_blockonomics_lead_desc4: Developed the Invoice Ninja integration and restructured API documentation to improve developer onboarding for third-party integrations.
writing_welcome_message: Welcome to my writing corner! I write about coding with an easy-going and personal perspective.
job_gpd_desc1: Developed and maintained web and mobile applications using React and React Native for an e-commerce platform serving customers globally.
job_gpd_desc2: Implemented features from design to deployment, working with Figma mockups and ensuring consistent user experiences across devices.
job_gpd_desc3: Introduced end-to-end testing with Cypress to catch regressions and improve application stability before releases.
job_gpd_desc4: Built responsive layouts and internationalization support (i18next), working with GraphQL APIs and payment flows including SCA compliance for UK transactions.
job_blockonomics_desc1: Developed WordPress plugins and CMS integrations to enable Bitcoin payment processing for merchants using PHP and Python.
job_blockonomics_desc2: Maintained and extended payment infrastructure across multiple CMS platforms to support cryptocurrency transactions.
job_blockonomics_desc3: Improved payment interfaces to reduce friction during checkout and increase accessibility for end users.
job_blockonomics_desc4: Supported merchants with technical implementation and troubleshooting to maintain reliable payment processing.
job_uae_desc1: Built web applications using serverless architecture (Netlify and Firebase), implementing authentication and third-party API integrations.
job_uae_desc2: Developed full-stack features using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) with a focus on performance and user experience.
